name: Rocket Blaze
description: Rocket Blaze is an oscilloscope themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box, it stands out in any crowd. Its classic screen displays data in a traditional manner, while the cat-shaped buttons add a touch of whimsy. Rocket Blaze's arms and legs are equipped with powerful rocket boosters, allowing it to navigate with exceptional speed and agility. Additionally, it is fitted with a special helmet add-on, enhancing its technological prowess. With its unique design and impressive capabilities, Rocket Blaze is a valuable member of the WebtrES club.
